services.title: Import & Export
services.description: Providing comprehensive solutions for import and export activities of raw materials, consumer products, and industrial goods. Ensuring fast and efficient transportation and customs procedures.

services.title: Distribution
services.description: Operating a flexible and modern distribution system, along with strategic relationships with major manufacturers in garments, food, furniture, household goods, and many other industries

blocks.description: VINHAPAC is proud to be a trusted partner, providing comprehensive import-export and distribution solutions, connecting high-quality supply sources with domestic and international market demands. With over 25 years of experience in multi-sector import-export and distribution in France, USA, and Thailand, VINHAPAC has established a solid position in domestic and international trade networks. The company provides comprehensive solutions for importing and exporting various items such as raw materials, consumer products, and industrial goods, ensuring quick and efficient transportation and customs procedures. VINHAPAC owns a flexible and modern distribution system, along with strategic relationships with many major manufacturers in sectors such as garments, fashion, food and beverages, furniture and home decoration, household goods, and many other industries. Located in Ho Chi Minh City - Vietnam's economic and logistics center, with a professional and experienced team, VINHAPAC commits to delivering superior service, building partnerships based on trust and long-term benefits. Our mission is 'Connecting high-quality supply sources with domestic and international market demands', aiming to build Vietnamese brands to reach international standards.

blocks.title: Export Product Groups
blocks.mainDescription: Specializing in import and export services with diverse product categories, including key sectors and various industries, ensuring efficiency and reliability.

services.title: Fashion and Accessories
services.description: Providing import-export solutions for the fashion industry, from raw materials to finished products, meeting market trends and international standards.

services.title: Furniture & Home Decoration
services.description: Transportation and distribution of wooden furniture and home decoration materials with professional processes, ensuring intact goods and timely delivery.

services.title: Processed Food & Refined Agricultural Products
services.description: We specialize in importing and exporting a diverse range of high-quality processed foods and agricultural products, ensuring clear origin and food safety.

blocks.title: Export Services
blocks.mainDescription: With a flexible and modern distribution system, along with strategic relationships with major manufacturers and partners, we ensure your products reach markets quickly.

services.title: Export Coordination & Transportation
services.description: We handle the entire logistics chain for export operations: from warehousing, container loading, domestic transportation, customs procedures, to international delivery. VINHAPAC ensures timely progress, document accuracy, and optimized operational costs for each shipment.

services.title: Official Export Representative
services.description: VINHAPAC represents Vietnamese suppliers in accessing and transacting with international customer networks. We are responsible for connecting, negotiating, providing legal advice, and accompanying throughout the journey of bringing products to foreign markets – ensuring transparency, efficiency, and compliance with international standards.

services.title: Sourcing and Quality Inspection
services.description: We help international buyers find suitable supply sources in Vietnam, from reputable factories to export-standard products. Additionally, VINHAPAC conducts quality inspections, factory assessments, and production process monitoring to ensure all shipments meet the strict requirements of import markets.

services.title: Private Label Manufacturing & Packaging
services.description: VINHAPAC provides manufacturing and packaging solutions according to customers' brand requirements (OEM/ODM). From packaging design, labeling to packaging standards – we work closely with factories to ensure consistency, branding, and product quality in every detail.

blocks.title: Processed Food & Refined Agricultural Products
blocks.subTitle: We specialize in importing and exporting a diverse range of high-quality processed foods and agricultural products, ensuring clear origin and food safety. Over 10,000 products are traded annually.

items.description: Carefully selected Jasmine rice, ensuring delicious flavor and top export quality. Meets international food safety standards.
Grade A cashews, naturally salted, crispy and nutritious. Convenient packaging, suitable for demanding markets.
Robusta coffee from Vietnam's highlands, with rich, distinctive flavor. Ensuring sustainable and fair production processes.

blocks.title: Fashion & Accessories
blocks.subTitle: VINHAPAC proudly provides comprehensive import-export solutions for the fashion and accessories industry. From sourcing high-quality raw materials to transporting and distributing finished products.

items.description: Crafted from 100% genuine imported cowhide leather, VINA-Leather Jacket offers a luxurious, elegant appearance that stands the test of time.
Inspired by the beauty of traditional Vietnamese culture, the 'Vietnamese Essence' Collection includes necklaces, earrings, and bracelets crafted from premium S925 silver.
VINHAPAC Chic Tote is the perfect choice for ladies who love convenience and style. Made from premium synthetic leather, water-resistant and easy to clean

blocks.title: Furniture & Home Decoration
blocks.subTitle: VINHAPAC provides comprehensive solutions in the furniture and home decoration sector, from sourcing to transportation and distribution. We commit to delivering high-quality products with clear origins, exquisite craftsmanship, while ensuring professional logistics processes for intact and timely delivery to partners and customers. With our extensive partner network, we confidently meet diverse market needs for furniture and decorative items, contributing to creating sophisticated living and working spaces.

items.description: VINA-Oak dining set is crafted from premium imported natural oak, featuring elegant wood grain and superior durability. Modern, minimalist design

items.productName: VINHAPAC Decor Shelf Versatile Display Unit
items.description: VINHAPAC Decor Shelf is a smart storage and display solution for any space. With its versatile design, you can easily adjust the structure to accommodate books, decorative items, or plants
The 'Peaceful Dawn' table lamp is a perfect blend of handcrafted ceramic art and warm lighting, creating an elegant accent for your bedroom.

blocks.title: Over 25 years of experience in Global Import-Export and Distribution
